ISSUE.TITLE: Hide prompt button on survey form when only prompt is extra vars
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY On the schedule form, the prompt button should not be shown when the only prompt is extra vars. Extra var prompting is done through the form itself. This is a break from the usual prompting behavior. Form: Clicking prompt button: ##### ENVIRONMENT awx: 6.1.0 ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE 1) Create a JT that only prompts for extra vars 2) Create a schedule for JT in step 1 3) Click on Prompt button in schedule form ##### EXPECTED RESULTS No prompt button ##### ACTUAL RESULTS Prompt button, empty modal

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4630 from ryanpetrello/cli-roles cli: add support for granting and revoking roles from users/teams Reviewed-by: https://github.com/apps/softwarefactory-project-zuul

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix condition to show prompt button on the schedule add/edit form it hides the prompt button on survey form when prompt is extra vars only. - Fixed issue #4528 Signed-off-by: Hideki Saito <saito@fgrep.org>
